[i]Incoming Danger[/i] – Each player plays with the top card of their library revealed. If an opponent has a creature card on top of their library, creatures you control have ward {3}.
[i]Nini's Grace[/i] – {1}{G}{U}: Untap another target creature you control. If that creature attacked this turn, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only once each turn.
